DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess impact light meal , standard meal , high fat meal PK BMS-955176 MC tablet dose 180 mg , relative fast condition .
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Purpose Other : This study assess impact light meal , standard meal , high fat meal pharmacokinetics ( PK ) BMS-955176 micronized crystalline ( MC ) tablet dose 180 mg relative fast condition .
DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Healthy subject determine clinically significant deviation normal medical history , physical examination , vital sign measurement , 12lead ECG measurement , clinical laboratory test result Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 32.0 kg/m2 , inclusive . BMI = Weight ( kg ) / [ Height ( ) ] 2 Men woman , age 18 50 year , inclusive Women must childbearing potential , must breastfeed Any significant acute chronic medical illness History cardiac disease clinically significant cardiac arrhythmia Current recent ( within 3 month study drug administration ) gastrointestinal disease Any major surgery within 4 week study drug administration Any gastrointestinal surgery ( include cholecystectomy ) could impact upon absorption study drug
